snippet.title: GTA The Lost and Damned - Full Game Walkthrough in 4K
snippet.description:
Grand Theft Auto 4: The Lost and Damned Full Movie Walkthrough / Guide video with all 22 missions and Random Characters - 4K Ultra HD 60 fps [Played on PC]

Rockstar Games Walkthrough Videos Playlist: https://bit.ly/2RP61Bl

► YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/GTASeriesVideos
► INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/GTASeriesNews
► FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/GTASeriesNews
► TWITTER: https://twitter.com/GTASeries
► DISCORD: https://discord.gg/GTASeries

0:00 Intro & Mission #1 - Clean and Serene
23:24 Mission #2 - Angels in America
28:25 Mission #3 - It's War
40:19 Mission #4 - Action/Reaction
51:44 Mission #5 - Liberty City Choppers
1:01:53 Mission #6 - Bad Cop Drop
1:07:55 Mission #7 - Buyer's Market
1:18:46 Mission #8 - Politics
1:27:31 Mission #9 - Coming Down
1:35:17 Mission #10 - Off Route
1:45:09 Mission #11 - This Shit's Cursed
2:01:31 Random Character - Dave Grossman
2:04:16 Mission #12 - Hit the Pipe
2:10:30 Mission #13 - End of Chapter
2:16:41 Mission #14 - Bad Standing
2:24:12 Random Character - Brian Jeremy
2:29:40 Mission #15 - Heavy Toll
2:39:11 Mission #16 - Marta Full of Grace
2:50:04 Mission #17 - Shifting Weight
3:00:00 Random Character - Malc #1
3:03:32 Random Character - Malc #2
3:08:47 Mission #18 - Roman's Holiday
3:20:08 Mission #19 - Diamonds in the Rough
3:30:13 Mission #20 - Collector's Item
3:38:08 Mission #21 - Was It Worth It?
3:48:18 Final Mission #22 / Ending - Get Lost
4:04:25 End Credits

#GTA4 #TheLostAndDamned #RockstarGames #GTASeriesVideos

ABOUT US

GTA Series Videos is a dedicated fan-channel in no way tied to Rockstar Games or Take-Two Interactive.

Here you can find all the latest news, video walkthroughs and official trailers of the most successful video games published by Rockstar Games, including Grand Theft Auto series, Red Dead Redemption, Max Payne, L.A. Noire, Bully and many others.

ABOUT GRAND THEFT AUTO IV: THE LOST AND DAMNED

Johnny is a veteran member of The Lost, a notorious biker gang. Johnny has been creating business opportunities for The Lost in Liberty City, but his first loyalty must be to the patch he wears on his back and to Billy Grey, the club's President. However, when Billy returns from rehab hell-bent on bloodshed and debauchery, Johnny finds himself in the middle of a vicious turf war with rival gangs for control of a city torn apart by violence and corruption. Can the brotherhood survive?
